data.title: U.S. Eyemart Express reveals Top 3 Spring Eyewear Trends
data.meta_description: Bold Colour Blocking, '90s Street, and Bespoke Sunglasses make a statement this season Spring marks the time to transition from a dark winter wardrobe to livelier on-trend styles for the new season. Eyemart Express, a leading optical retailer and the fastest provider of quality prescription eyewear in the industry, is helping fashion-forward customers find high-quality…
data.text:
Bold Colour Blocking, ’90s Street, and Bespoke Sunglasses make a statement this season

Spring marks the time to transition from a dark winter wardrobe to livelier on-trend styles for the new season. Eyemart Express, a leading optical retailer and the fastest provider of quality prescription eyewear in the industry, is helping fashion-forward customers find high-quality and affordable prescription glasses and sunglasses in spring’s hottest trends

“Updating eyewear is an easy way to experiment with on-trend styles in a way that will both transform your everyday look and translate to your lifestyle,” said Paula Blomquist, chief marketing and merchandising officer at Eyemart Express. “This season is focused on colorful and vintage-inspired looks, and our robust product assortment is curated to help consumers achieve their desired look at affordable prices.”

Top Spring 2019 Eyewear Trends:

• ’90s Street. The ’90s are back — grab a pair of metal frames from the High Street, Masterpiece, or Vogue collections that feature rounded edges. Style meets sophistication with the simplicity of this trend.

• Bold Color Blocking. Why wear one color when you can wear two? Bold, saturated colorful frames from Gucci, Plume, and Timberland transform your everyday office attire into a statement look. Or take color to a whole new level by matching bright frames with tinted lenses.

• Bespoke Sunglasses. Express your personal style and stand out in a crowd with bespoke sunglasses. The possibilities are endless when it comes to creating your one-of-a-kind pair with polarized lens treatments and a swirl of color and mirrored finishes.

Shop the hottest spring trends at your local Eyemart Express store: https://www.eyemartexpress.com/get-glasses.

Eyemart Express, a leading optical retailer and the fastest provider of quality prescription eyewear in the industry, has been serving consumers for more than 29 years. With 193 stores in 36 states, Eyemart Express ranks among the Top 10 largest optical retailers in the country with its family of brands: Vision4Less, Visionmart Express, and Eyewear Express. The company operates under its motto of Right Glasses. Right Price. Right Now: a unique mix of value, style, and timely service. Each store carries more than 2,000 frames from brands such as Gucci, Ray-Ban, Kate Spade, Columbia, Tommy Hilfiger, and Michael Kors. Onsite labs allow 90 % of glasses to be delivered on the same day.
